items.question: Do you help with system design interviews?
items.answer: Yes. We build system design narratives and practice for your target level.

items.question: Can you help me move from Senior to Staff?
items.answer: Yes. We focus on scope, ownership, and leadership signal.

items.question: Do you work with frontend or backend engineers?
items.answer: Yes. We tailor to your stack and role focus.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: Most clients see momentum in 2–6 weeks depending on package.

items.question: Can you rewrite my resume?
items.answer: Yes. Resume writing is included in brand packages or as a standalone.

items.question: Do you help with negotiation?
items.answer: Yes. Negotiation planning is part of interview and coaching packages.

items.question: What if I’m changing companies but not level?
items.answer: We still position your impact to maximize comp and role quality.

items.question: Is this only for Big Tech?
items.answer: No. We work across Big Tech, startups, and enterprise.
